name: Ino
description: INO is an Adventure/Horror story driven game that tells the story of Kaede and Hitaki, two classmates that get involved with a mysterious girl called Ino. Follow the story as they try to figure out who she is while they try to escape from being murdered.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Dual Core or Superior Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1GB Graphic Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Sound Device
